actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide for an increase in the duties on imports of potatoes, and to reduce the quota for potatoes subject to the lower of the two rates of duty.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to increase the customs duties on potatoes, and to lower the quota on potatoes which may be imported at the lesser of two rates of duty.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide for an increase in the duties on imports of potatoes, and to reduce the quota for potatoes subject to the lower of the two rates of duty.
